<?php if ($social_discount_ok_like_enabled): ?>
(function(w){
  function onShare(e) {
    var args = e.data.split("$");
    if (args[0] == "ok_shared") {
      sd_userAction('ok','like');
    }
  }
  
  if (w.addEventListener) {
    w.addEventListener('message', onShare, false);
  } else {
    w.attachEvent('onmessage', onShare);
  }
}(window));
<?php endif; ?>

function sd_userAction(soc, action) {
	var product_id = <?php echo $product_id; ?>;
	$.ajax({
		url: '<?php echo $this->url->link('module/social_discount/action'); ?>',
		type: 'POST',
		dataType: 'json',
		data: {
			"product_id": product_id,
			"social": soc,
			"action": action
		},
		success: function(data) {
			if (data['success']) {
				sd_updateOffer(data);
			}
		}
	});
}
